4.label: Position
4.placeholder: Owner, marketing manager, head of sales etc.

5.label: Why is establishing a digital presence important to you at this stage?
5.placeholder: Please explain what made you take action to reach out to me now. Why not before? Please be specific

6.label: How would you best describe where you feel you are right now when it comes to launching a digital website strategy?

1.label: Just seeing options out there / browsing

7.label: Competitor Website URLs
7.placeholder: Please list up to 5 competitor URLs in your space whose digital strategy you admire, also be specific about what you like about these sites

8.label: Will you require help to drive targeted organic traffic from search engines to your website landing pages after completion of project?

1.label: No, we have an SEO expert on board who can look after this

2.label: We just require the site to be search engine friendly

3.label: We are looking for an ongoing SEO strategy to continually grow our website visitors

9.label: What is your most popular/profitable product/service?
9.placeholder: These are the products/services that you would like to make the focal point of your online presence. List up to 5.

10.label: How do new clients find you right now?
10.placeholder: Print, referrals etc. Also include how satisifed you are with these methods at the moment.

11.label: Collateral URL
11.description: (Optional) If you have an online accessible folder with collateral (e.g. style guide, past print ads, product/service brochures, photographs of products/staff/letter testimonials) please include the DropBox/Google Drive etc. link below

12.label: Will you require the assistance of a copywriter/content writer?

1.label: Yes, I will need help with structuring my content for the web and maximizing conversions

2.label: No, I all ready have someone that writes my content and will not require assistance with this

3.label: Not sure - but willing to discuss further

13.label: How many pages do you expect your website to have (approximately)?

14.label: What are your success metrics for this project?
14.placeholder: What kind of goals are you looking to achieve specifically with your digital presence - that were they reached - you would consider this project a success? Please be specific

15.label: Industry Publications / Further Reading
15.placeholder: If your service/product is of a technical nature please include links to any relevant trade publications or additional information that I can research to get an understanding of your industry and its direction.

1.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will be in touch with you shortly.
